name: SelfHelpCompany
0:
”Alexa, open self help company”
”Alexa, ask self help company for the latest update”
”Alexa, start self help company”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: self help company
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the latest blogs posts from The Sel-Help Company. Get the latest self-improvement tips, techniques, and strategies you can use to take your life from where you are to where you want to go. Ben Povlow, author of the book Self-Help for At-Risk Teens combines personal life experiences with proven personal-development strategies in his blog posts, podcast episodes, and videos. Learn more about how Ben can help you take your life to the next level today! 

Disclaimer: the information provided by the skill is for informational and educational purposes only. "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis.
If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number."

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
